word:
Jesus says, "Come unto Me, all ye that are weary and heavy laden, and I will give you rest." No longer grieve the heart of Christ. God calls for you to come! Take your position under the bloodstained banner of Prince Immanuel. Enthrone the Bible in your heart, and live by every word that proceedeth from the mouth of God.--Letter 108, 1896. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. Sept. 8, 1988. Entire Letter.
